member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the GetValue and SetValue events of the PropertyBag class.

member.name: T:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag
member.summary: Represents a collection of custom properties that can be selected into a PropertyGrid to provide functionality beyond that of the simple reflection normally used to query an object's properties.

member.summary: Raises the GetValue event.
member.param: A PropertySpecEventArgs that contains the event data.

member.summary: Raises the SetValue event.
member.param: A PropertySpecEventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: E:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.GetValue
member.summary: Occurs when a PropertyGrid requests the value of a property.

member.name: E:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.SetValue
member.summary: Occurs when the user changes the value of a property in a PropertyGrid.

member.name: T:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection
member.summary: Encapsulates a collection of PropertySpec objects.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PropertySpecCollection class.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.Add(Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertySpec)
member.summary: Adds a PropertySpec to the end of the PropertySpecCollection.
member.param: The PropertySpec to be added to the end of the PropertySpecCollection.
member.returns: The PropertySpecCollection index at which the value has been added.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.AddRange(Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertySpec[])
member.summary: Adds the elements of an array of PropertySpec objects to the end of the PropertySpecCollection.
member.param: The PropertySpec array whose elements should be added to the end of the PropertySpecCollection.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.Clear
member.summary: Removes all elements from the PropertySpecCollection.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.Contains(Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertySpec)
member.summary: Determines whether a PropertySpec is in the PropertySpecCollection.
member.param: The PropertySpec to locate in the PropertySpecCollection. The element to locate can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
member.returns: true if item is found in the PropertySpecCollection; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.Contains(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether a PropertySpec with the specified name is in the PropertySpecCollection.
member.param: The name of the PropertySpec to locate in the PropertySpecCollection.
member.returns: true if item is found in the PropertySpecCollection; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.CopyTo(Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertySpec[])
member.summary: Copies the entire PropertySpecCollection to a compatible one-dimensional Array, starting at the beginning of the target array.
member.param: The one-dimensional Array that is the destination of the elements copied from PropertySpecCollection. The Array must have zero-based indexing.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.CopyTo(Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertySpec[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies the PropertySpecCollection or a portion of it to a one-dimensional array.
member.param: The one-dimensional Array that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the PropertySpecCollection.
member.returns: An IEnumerator for the entire PropertySpecCollection.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.IndexOf(Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertySpec)
member.summary: Searches for the specified PropertySpec and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire PropertySpecCollection.
member.param: The PropertySpec to locate in the PropertySpecCollection.
member.returns: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of value within the entire PropertySpecCollection, if found; otherwise, -1.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.IndexOf(System.String)
member.summary: Searches for the PropertySpec with the specified name and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire PropertySpecCollection.
member.param: The name of the PropertySpec to locate in the PropertySpecCollection.
member.returns: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of value within the entire PropertySpecCollection, if found; otherwise, -1.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.Insert(System.Int32,Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertySpec)
member.summary: Inserts a PropertySpec object into the PropertySpecCollection at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
The PropertySpec to insert.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.Remove(Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertySpec)
member.summary: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the PropertySpecCollection.
member.param: The PropertySpec to remove from the PropertySpecCollection.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the property with the specified name from the PropertySpecCollection.
member.param: The name of the PropertySpec to remove from the PropertySpecCollection.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the object at the specified index of the PropertySpecCollection.
member.param: The zero-based index of the element to remove.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.PropertyBag.PropertySpecCollection.ToArray
member.summary: Copies the elements of the PropertySpecCollection to a new PropertySpec array.
member.returns: A PropertySpec array containing copies of the elements of the PropertySpecCollection.

member.name: T:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel
member.summary: This is the presentation model for the UI for setting up Writing Systems using either a writing system store or a single writing system. In order to use any of the provided UI elements within your own forms, you need to instantiate a WritingSystemSetupModel object and bind the UI elements to that object. WritingSystemSetupDialog provides its own WritingSystemSetupModel object and can be used by itself.

member.name: F:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.MethodToShowUiToBootstrapNewDefinition
member.summary: UI layer can set this to something which shows a dialog to get the basic info

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.#ctor(Palaso.WritingSystems.IWritingSystemStore)
member.summary: Creates the presentation model object based off of a writing system store of some sort.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.#ctor(Palaso.WritingSystems.WritingSystemDefinition)
member.summary: Creates the presentation model object based off of a single writing system definition. This is the easiest form to use if you only want part of the UI elements or only operate on one WritingSystemDefiniion

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.SetCurrentIndexFromRfc46464(System.String)
member.returns: false if the code wasn't found

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.DeleteCurrent
member.summary: Deletes the currently selected writing system.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.DuplicateCurrent
member.summary: Makes a copy of the currently selected writing system and selects the new copy.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.AddNew
member.summary: Creates a new writing system and selects it.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.Save
member.summary: Saves all writing systems in the store, if possible.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.ExportCurrentWritingSystemAsFile(System.String)
member.summary: Exports the current writing system to a file.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.ActivateCurrentKeyboard
member.summary: Activates the custom keyboard for the currently selected writing system.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.TestSort(System.String)
member.summary: Performs a sort on the given string using the sort rules defined in the current writing system.
member.param: String to sort, separated by newlines

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.ValidateCurrentSortRules(System.String@)
member.summary: Validates the current custom sort rules.
member.param: Error message, if any. This will only be set if false is returned.
member.returns: True if rules are valid, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.ImportFile(System.String)
member.summary: Imports the given file into the writing system store.
member.param: Full path of file to import

member.name: P:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.WritingSystemSuggestor
member.summary: Use this to set the appropriate kinds of writing systems according to your application. For example, is the user of your app likely to want voice? ipa? dialects?

member.name: P:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.KeyboardNames
member.summary: Provides a list of all possible installed keyboards.

member.name: P:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.FontFamilies
member.summary: Provides a list of all available Font family names on the system.

member.name: P:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.CurrentDefinition
member.summary: For internal use only. To access information about the writing system, you should use the CurrentXXX Properties which mirror the public properties available on WritingSystemDefinition. This is needed to ensure that the UI stays up to date with any changes to the underlying WritingSystemDefinition.

member.name: P:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.CurrentIndex
member.summary: The index of the currently selected WritingSystemDefinition from the list of available definitions. This will be -1 if there is no selection.

member.name: P:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.HasCurrentSelection
member.summary: Returns true if there is a WritingSystemDefinition currently selected for display and editing.

member.name: P:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.WritingSystemListColumns
member.summary: Columns to include in a list of WritingSystemDefinitions.

member.name: P:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.WritingSystemListItems
member.summary: Returns a list of available WritingSystemDefinitions. The arrays returned will have elements corresponding with the columns returned by WritingSystemListColumns.

member.name: P:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.WritingSystemListCanSave
member.summary: Gives a true/false flag for all available WritingSystemDefinitions on whether or not the underlying store will be able to save them. This could be false due to two definitions having the same identifying information.

member.name: P:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.WritingSystemListCurrentItem
member.summary: The columns to display in a list for only the currently selected writing system.

member.name: P:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.WritingSystemCount
member.summary: Returns the total number of writing systems available.

member.name: P:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.CanSaveCurrent
member.summary: Whether or not the underlying store will be able to save the currently selected writing system.

member.name: P:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.SortUsingOptions
member.summary: Returns a list of possible sort options as (option, description) pairs

member.name: P:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.SortLanguageOptions
member.summary: Gets a list of (value, description) pairs for language options for sorting

member.name: P:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.UsingWritingSystemStore
member.summary: True if the model has an underlying writing system store, false if it is operating on only a single WritingSystemDefinition.

member.name: E:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.ItemAddedOrDeleted
member.summary: Fires when a WritingSystemDefinition is added or deleted.

member.name: E:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.ListColumnsChanged
member.summary: Fires whenever the columns in a list of writing systems change.

member.name: E:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.SelectionChanged
member.summary: Fired when the selection changes to a different WritingSystemDefinition. When the currently selected item is deleted, this event will fire first to select another WritingSystemDefinition, and then the ItemAddedOrDeleted event will fire. When an item is added, ItemAddedOrDeleted will fire first, and then this event will fire to indicated the selection of the new item.

member.name: E:Palaso.UI.WindowsForms.WritingSystems.WritingSystemSetupModel.CurrentItemUpdated
member.summary: This event is fired whenever the currently selected WritingSystemDefinition is changed.
